paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Zonabris przewalskyi Dokhtouroff, 1887: 341
.
Type locality: “ Dans les montagnes longeant les rivières Kontschun-tchu , Tschumtschuoùmà , By-djune ” ( Xizang , China )
. Type depository: unknown.

Mylabris goutelli Fairmaire, 1889: 48
.
Type locality: “ Thibet , Atentse ” ( Xizang , China )
.
Type depository: MNHN . Synonymized by
Borchmann, 1917: 46
.
